languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Исторжение отработанных субстанций является частью протокола очистки".
"This statement is true. The disposal of waste substances is an integral part of the cleaning protocol."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. Исторжение отработанных субстанций является частью протокола очистки".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. Release of spent substances is an integral part of the cleaning protocol."

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. L'évacuation des substances usées fait partie intégrante du protocole de nettoyage. »

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. La eliminación de sustancias residuales es una parte integral del protocolo de limpieza».

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的，废弃物质处理是清洁协议的组成部分。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The disposal of waste substances is an integral part of the cleaning protocol."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的，废弃物质处理是清洁协议的组成部分。”

languages.text: 「この記述は正しい。廃棄物の処理は、洗浄手順の不可欠な部分である」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The disposal of waste substances is an integral part of the cleaning protocol."

traits.locale_text: 「この記述は正しい。廃棄物の処理は、洗浄手順の不可欠な部分である」

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Entsorgung von Altsubstanzen ist ein essenzieller Bestandteil des Reinigungsprotokolls."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The disposal of waste substances is an integral part of the cleaning protocol."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Entsorgung von Altsubstanzen ist ein essenzieller Bestandteil des Reinigungsprotokolls."

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Atık maddelerden kurtulma, temizlik protokollerinin olmazsa olmaz bir parçasıdır."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The disposal of waste substances is an integral part of the cleaning protocol."
